revisionDesc.change: Submit - Corrected word divisions in ll. 1a-1; 1-2; 6-7; 7-8; 12-13; 13-14; 17-18; 18-19; 24-25; 25-26; 26-27; 27-28; 32-33; 37-38; 38-39; 41-42; 46-47. In ll. 47-48 I deleted the underdots in the regularized form of praetium

Submit - Corrected word divisions in ll. 1a-1; 1-2; 6-7; 7-8; 12-13; 13-14; 17-18; 18-19; 24-25; 25-26; 26-27; 27-28; 32-33; 37-38; 38-39; 41-42; 46-47. In ll. 47-48 I deleted the underdots in the regularized form of praetium
Automatic insertion of lb tags into origs to match existing lb tags in the reg
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)

plo satis esse facturum, et rei quoque meliorataemeliorate instructaeinstructe aedificataequeaedificateque rati
one habita simili modo duplariae rei reddere pollicetur secundum legum ordine.

Iulianus, forensis civitatis Ravennatis, scriptorscribtor huius documenti sex unciarum fundi Geniciani
cum casale, sicut superius legitur, a testibus roboratum et traditum
in praesenti compleviconplevi et absolvi. ego Iulianus.
notitia testium:
Eusebius, adiutor scrinii cancannonum, qui manet ad Sanctum Stefanum.
Florentinus, ex praeposito pistorum, qui manet ad Sancta Agnite.
Oderit, filius quondam Boherde.
Probus, ex primicerio nomenclatornomencolatorum
Petrus, collectariuscollictar, ante custodiamcustodia carcerischarcer.
